text: One Night Only is a 2014 independent short film directed, and co-written by Che Grant & Michael Boccalini, produced by Paddy Grant and stars Caroline Lawton and Sean Pogmore. It premiered at the Portsmouth International Film Festival 2014 and was screened at over 150 festivals worldwide. ==Plot summary== Set over a single night, in & around the streets of London. A first date between Mary-Ann, an uptight 40 year old and Liam, a roguish 29 year old. == Awards == |- | 2014 | One Night Only | Best Short Film | | | | |- | 2014 | One Night Only | Best Director | Che Grant | | | |- | 2014 | One Night Only | Leading Actress in a Short Film | Caroline Lawton | | | |- | 2014 | One Night Only | Hair/Make-Up | | | | ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * Category:2014 films Category:British short films Category:English- language films Category:British films
title: One Night Only (2014 film)
